answers.answer: nope I eat a whole bunch od sweets...my dentist on da other hand well dats a different story lol
My doctor told me that you don't really have to worry about nutritional value at this point. I had a sweet tooth until 9 weeks.

It can be. Too much sugar is never good for you pregnant or not. It can cause excessive weight gain and in rare cases lead to gestational diabetes. A few sweets are fine just try not to overdo it. :-)

question: Im 6 weeks and i eat alot of sweets is this a bad thing??
title: sweet tooth
